text: Kɨ uabɨ dagher kam, ikɨrɨmɨrir zurara itim anɨdim, Godɨn Nguibam ategha egha zaghirɨ. Eghtɨ gumazitam dagher kamra ameghɨva, a zurara itir ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuarim iniam. Dagher kɨ a danɨngamim, a nan nivafɨzim. Kɨ kamagh sua, nguazimɨn gumazamiziba me angamra ikiam, kamaghɨn kɨ me bagh uan nivafɨzim anenigham.”
